text: I've been feeling really down lately, struggling with thoughts that I'm not good enough, especially in my personal relationships. It's tough to talk about, but I feel like my addiction has affected my sexual confidence.
I wanted to share a win with you - I was able to resist the urge to use yesterday by going for a run instead. It felt great to channel that energy into something positive.
I'm having a hard time today. The cravings are really strong, and it's all I can think about.
I just wanted to say thank you for today's session. It really helped me to open up about my struggles and I feel like I'm making progress.
